events.message: I recently received my order, but unfortunately the item has multiple scratches and a broken hinge. It looks defective and unusable.
The issue has been classified under Product Defect due to reported scratches and broken parts on the item.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the case regarding the damaged product.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your order. I’m here to help you resolve this matter as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos showing the scratches and the broken hinge? This will help us process your claim faster.
Here are the photos of the damaged item. You can clearly see the scratches on the surface and the hinge is snapped, making it unusable.
Thank you for providing the photos. We can offer you a replacement or a full refund. Which option would you prefer?
I would prefer a replacement, please, as I liked the product but want it in perfect condition.
We have processed the replacement order and it will be shipped within 2 business days. You will receive a tracking number shortly.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your replacement and that it is in perfect condition. Please let us know if everything is satisfactory.
Yes, I received the replacement today and it is in perfect condition. Thank you very much for the prompt support!
We are glad to hear everything is resolved. We are closing your case now. Have a great day!
Please take a moment to complete our satisfaction survey. Your feedback helps us improve our service.
